entry.title: Katie Morag; and Topsy and Tim
entry.summary: This Sunday a new series based on the Katie Morag books will be starting. It looks like it should be good. The Beeb will also be bringing us Topsy and Tim. Some of the books are fairly dull, but the kids seem to like them, so we’ll see how the TV show pans out.
entry.content:
This Sunday a new series based on the Katie Morag books will be starting. It looks like it should be good.

The Beeb will also be bringing us Topsy and Tim. Some of the books are fairly dull, but the kids seem to like them, so we’ll see how the TV show pans out.
